articles.title: 5-year-old killed in ATV crash into tree
articles.description: Ontario Provincial Police (OPP) are investigating an ATV crash that killed a 5-year-old child in Brudenell, Lyndoch, and Raglan (BLR) Township over the weekend. articles.title: Montreal budget: STM still missing hundreds of millions for maintenance despite increase
articles.description: The STM's $1.8 billion budget for 2026 includes cuts, including 300 jobs being eliminated, and a delay to transitioning to electric buses.

articles.title: Mayor says 2026 Montreal budget is responsible; opposition says it 'smells like austerity'
articles.description: “If you find this budget boring because there’s no major projects for this year, I think that’s a great thing,” says executive committee chair Claude Pinard. “We’re getting back to the basics of what a city's job is."

articles.title: A new test reveals which antibiotics truly kill bacteria
articles.description: Some antibiotics stop bacteria from growing without actually killing them, allowing infections to return later.
